wikipedia_page.main: Clive Marshall (born 1 January 1939) is a British rower. He competed in the men's coxless pair event at the 1960 Summer Olympics.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1960 Summer Olympics

response: For two years since 26 September 2014 EANA's President was Clive Marshall, CEO of the British news agency Press Association (PA).
